articles.content: In a development that translates to a more accurate understanding of the Moon, scientists can now ascertain the components of the moon’s core. It is neither solid nor molten. In fact, the moon is ind… [+3372 chars]

articles.title: Russia Traces Luna-25 Crash to Onboard Control System Failure - SpacePolicyOnline.com
articles.description: Posted: October 6, 2023 6:00 pm ET | Last Updated: October 6, 2023 6:21 pm ET | Russia has concluded that the Luna-25 lunar probe crashed onto the Moon because an onboard control system did not get required data from the accelerometer to turn off the engine a…
articles.content: Russia’s state space corporation Roscosmos has concluded that Luna-25 failed because the onboard control system did not receive required data from the accelerometer to trigger an engine shutdown at t… [+4777 chars]
